attributes.action: legally create a real life crimefighting justice league for civilians to help police during tough times
attributes.additional_details: to help the police during tough times allow the formation of a  liceneced civilian justice league,to help deter crime by allowing those within this organisation to fight crime within common law so that a ordinary law abaiding citizen can stop feeling powerless sign up and become a real crimefighting hero just like the avengers to help ease problems with police reductions.
